name: PlusOne
description:
It is my first game, I built this for the ongoing TriJam : The Ultimate Mega Extreme Edition. The game is based on theme :  "+1".

The game will not be updated and this is the final build.

It lacks animations, particle effects and music. I made it as simple as i can to learn the basics of game development.

The game has faulty ending, as in the process of making the game,  i wrote codes all over the place. This happened because of following different tutors and doing stuff on my own.
The overall experience was satisfying, seeing a game of my own and having it on a jam is wonderful.

Hope you like it.

Any suggestions and feedback are welcome.
